verbose_text: Furthermore, PIKK proteins have substantial redundancy between family members, and even though DNA-PK can phosphorylate RAG2, it may only do this in vitro in the absence of other PIKKs such as ATM, which we now show is also capable of phosphorylating RAG2 at position S365.
evidence: PIKK proteins have substantial redundancy between family members                           , and even though DNA-PK can phosphorylate RAG2
